main.name: Ingþór Birkir Árnason
main.description: I am a Software Developer living in Bern, Switzerland
main.bio: I love exploring and experiencing something new. I like to learn new things when I can. I have also a great interest in football, outdoor activities and sports. I have great communications skills and am well organized.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Main focus on Web Development and UI design

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Working as external contractor for the Swiss government. Mainly working on web application as a fullstack developer. Creating Unit tests, Integration tests and Regression tests for the project. Working with Cloud Foundry, JIRA and Jenkins.  Creating Jenkinsfiles for customised projects, detailed documentation for projects. Working with Kafka events, sending and receiving messages.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Working remotely as a technical consultant for Risk Management Solutions. Working in integration solutions and platforms mostly in the backend.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Front end developer in an young startup company in Reykjavik. Got great experience from working in agile and fast-paced startup environment. I implemented many new features on the website and had an active role in decision making process. Hands on experience with React and Redux and AWS and Git. Wrote some articles about Iceland as well.

projects.title: Sport Social
projects.category: Hobby project for people that like to live an active lifestyle

projects.title: Travelade
projects.category: Travel guids by locals in the know. Helps people find recommendations and local insights from all across the world.
